meanings.definition: A plant of the lily family with long, narrow leaves and white flowers.
meanings.sent1: The beargrass in the garden has beautiful white flowers.
meanings.sent2: Hikers often admire the beargrass along the trails.
meanings.sent3: The beargrass whispered secrets to the tulips in the garden.
meanings.sent4: Her words were delicate like the petals of beargrass.
meanings.sent5: The beargrass swayed gently in the breeze, a graceful dancer in the meadow.

meanings.definition: A grasslike plant with long, narrow leaves and white flowers, native to western North America.
meanings.sent1: The beargrass thrives in the forests of the Pacific Northwest.
meanings.sent2: The beargrass adds a touch of elegance to the landscape.
meanings.sent3: The beargrass played hide-and-seek with the pine trees.
meanings.sent4: The beargrass stood tall like a sentinel guarding the woods.
meanings.sent5: The beargrass carpeted the forest floor, a soft blanket under the trees.

meanings.definition: A plant with long, narrow leaves and white flowers, used in basket weaving by Native American tribes.
meanings.sent1: The beargrass was carefully woven into intricate patterns.
meanings.sent2: Artisans skillfully crafted baskets from beargrass.
meanings.sent3: The beargrass giggled as it was twisted into a new design.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity bloomed like the beargrass in her hands.
meanings.sent5: The beargrass whispered stories of the weavers who came before.
